tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geothermal_research_data (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  research_title TEXT NOT NULL,
  researcher_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  publication_date DATE,
  research_area TEXT,
  findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE geothermal_research_findings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    research_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    research_summary TEXT,
    research_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research_publications (
    publication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    publication_author TEXT NOT NULL,
    publication_year INT,
    research_finding_id INT REFERENCES geothermal_research_findings(id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_findings (
    research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    research_title VARCHAR(255),
    research_description TEXT,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
    publication_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE publications (
    publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_title VARCHAR(255),
    publication_type VARCHAR(50),
    publication_link VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE researchers (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
    researcher_email VARCHAR(100),
    institution_name VARCHAR(100),
    research_area VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Geothermal_Research_Study (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_title TEXT,
  study_abstract TEXT,
  study_author TEXT,
  study_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Geothermal_Publications (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_title TEXT,
  publication_abstract TEXT,
  publication_author TEXT,
  publication_date DATE,
  publication_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Research_Teams (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name TEXT,
  team_leader TEXT,
  team_members TEXT[],
  team_department TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Research_Facilities (
  facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name TEXT,
  facility_location TEXT,
  facility_capacity INT,
  facility_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE GeothermalLocations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  country TEXT,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchProjects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  lead_researcher TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchFindings (
  finding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  finding_description TEXT,
  finding_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES ResearchProjects(project_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Publications (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_title TEXT NOT NULL,
  publication_date DATE,
  researcher_name TEXT,
  project_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES ResearchProjects(project_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  affiliation TEXT,
  email TEXT
)
